cc1000_raw.h File Reference

Functions

void cc1000_raw_init ()
 Init function.

Detailed Description

Driver provides: use of cc1000 radio raw, without any MAC.

Driver requires: AVR architecture with cc1000 connected via SPI bus.

Author:
Brian Shucker & Jeff Rose
Date:
03/03/2004
